title: Auto generate the SDK
description: Spend more time improving your barista skills and less time fiddling with GETs and POSTs to call your API.  We will generate the SDK to be incorporated into your frontend code.

title: Auto deploy and scale
description: We take the complexity out of deploying your API in our serverless environment.  We auto-scale our infrastructure to match your call patterns 24/7.

title: Free when not used
description: We use just the right amount of processor time to run your code for instant response and zero overhead thus zero charge when unused.
